name: inverted echoes [beta]
description:
on PC: use the arrow keys to navigate (if it gives you trouble at the start, you may need to use your cursor to click within the game, then begin using the arrow keys).

on mobile: drag your finger to navigate (less ideal gameplay, sorry!)

audio by my cool friend https://ruune.itch.io/

*this game is in beta! still working out some minor details & it will be continually updated as i work out glitches/get feedback from play-testing, so check back! (mostly just uploading it here for easy access for critique for school.)

feel free to share feedback with me! i'm easiest to track down on instagram @saltcircle
